testsuite.system-out:
Feature: Blog Comments In order to show the rest of the world I'm even smarter than the blogger As a Reader I want to be able to comment on a blog entry
--Output from View Blog Comments-- Scenario: View Blog Comments # blog_comments.feature:6 Given I visit the blog for my favorite blogger When I choose a blog post Then I should see comments left by other readers
--Output from Leave a comment (AJAX)-- # Use AJAX for this # do not want the page to refresh Scenario: Leave a comment (AJAX) # blog_comments.feature:13 Given I am reading a blog post from my favorite blogger When I add my genius comment to the blog post Then my genius comment is at the top of the blog post comments
testsuite.system-err: --Output from View Blog Comments-- --Output from Leave a comment (AJAX)--
